/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant mix of green and brown. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows on the ground. A white truck is seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise tranquil setting. The image is taken from a low angle, giving a unique perspective that emphasizes the height of the trees and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and dimension, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the towering trees and the vast sky.
